title: She Wants To Know Why Her Secret Work Romance Abruptly Ended
description:
Our listener started a secret romance with one of her coworkers. At first, everything was going great. They spoke every day and even planned their first date. But days before their date, he ghosted her!
Now he acts like nothing between them ever happened, and she wants to know why. Any advice?
